reference.title: Content and manifest requirements
reference.shortdesc: Check the restrictions and requirements for streams and playlists (manifests), including DRM encryption keys.

row.entry: If the DRM-protected stream is multiple bit rate (MBR), the DRM encryption key used for the MBR should be the same as the key used in all the bit-rate streams.
Must have the same bit-rate renditions as the renditions of the main content.
